title: Treasury Liquidity Drain: $150 Billion in Settlements Could Pressure Stocks and Crypto
shortdescription: Up to $150B in Treasury settlements may drain market liquidity, raising risks for stocks, crypto, and global markets as dollar funding and yen volatility rise.
description: Liquidity tightening ahead: Treasury supply spike puts markets on watch as $150 billion in settlements could pressure stocks, crypto, and global risk assets.
author: Gwen John

title: Google Achieves Quantum Supremacy 2.0 – Solves Problem in Seconds That Would Take Classical Computer 47,000 Years
shortdescription: Sycamore 3 quantum processor breaks all records as Google stock surges 18% on breakthrough announcement.
description: Sycamore 3 completes calculation in 200 seconds that would take world's fastest supercomputer 47,000 years — Google stock jumps 18%.
author: Gwen John

title: ISRO Investigates PSLV-C62 Anomaly After EOS-N1 Satellite Loss
shortdescription: ISRO hit a snag in its PSLV-C62 mission late in flight, resulting in the loss of the EOS-N1 satellite.
description: The mission sent up 16 payloads including the strategic EOS-N1 satellite, all of which were lost after a third-stage anomaly.
author: Gwen John
